messages.content: Only use the functions you have been provided with if needed to help the user with this question. As a helpful assistant please assist the user in marketing and staying on track for this question/idea

I need help marketing an idea about an LLM Assistant. To start I just need you to make a schedule of a few days in this next week to make sure I do some tasks to stay on top of it.
        Can you suggest some tasks like 'Post to LinkedIn to Market the idea', 'Code and Planning time', 'YouTube video due' so I end up with a plan that will help me market it and build it

functions.name: llm_functions_scheduling
functions.description: If the user needs help scheduling this will help create tasks in their personal calendar.

tasks.description: Each task to schedule can be placed in a list like the following tasks: [{date: string, description: string}] The format of data should be 0000-00-00
